Name: Anonymous
Positive: Location is good. Facilities are fair.
Negative:
Staff at reception are very nice, helpful and polite. But some others are lack of responsibility, empathy. I arrived on 20th April afternoon. When I enter my room, room temperature is 32 C and in room air condition was not working. I tried to lowerdown the temperature but it automatically went up 32 C. 
BWhen I told one lady who is doing housekeeping. She informed another lady who came into the room and tried to open window but failed and went back. Then 30 minutes later I rang to housekeeping and some one said that one person will be coming. I waited there but up to 55 minutes no one come and I can’t stayed in room of 32-33 C anymore. 
And then I want down the reception and told receptionist that I want to change my room. She asked me “ did you use toilet ? and inform to her senior. After that she told me no room left and she would inform engineer who would try to fix before midnight but it is not sure he can fix it or not. I told her what should I do? I booked very early, paid for two days, can’t stay anymore in room of 32-34C.( at that time more than 1 hr and may be up midnight)
She said that she arrange to open my window and then I went back to my hot room to wait someone. 10 minutes later one guy come in and remove screw by machine and then the window opened. 
He said “”this is not our fault because system failure”
So I want to ask
Is this my fault to get this room?
Can anyone stay in room of 32-33 C with thick carpet, no window for more than 1 hour? ( may be more than that if I not told receptionist)
Can anyone come and remove the screw to open since my first request?

Name: Anonymous
Review_title: Perfect for one night. In serious need of upgrade but good value for money
Positive:
The fact that the receptionist was able to accommodate a really early check in made my day, and into a room with amazing views. 
My booking was for room without window, but I was checked into a room with window, so that was nice! 
The room was larger than expected, had ample floor space, lots of storage etc.
 Lots of tv channels. 
Coffee/tea in room. 
Helpful friendly staff. 
Location is ok- minutes walk from Canary Wharf, easy to access.
Negative:
Discoloured shower curtains, cheap thin toilet paper, really uncomfortable bed (can feel all the springs, I actually got bruises from laying down!), I don’t think the duvet cover has been changed since the last guests stayed - it looked and felt dirty, not crisp as the pillows and sheet felt like. You can tell when something isn’t clean/has been slept in already. 
No proper internet in the room, you get 2 x 20 minutes for free, then you need to buy voucher for any extra minutes. A day pass is £7. Apparently WiFi is free in lobby though. 
 The rooms looks run down, and could do with some serious upgrades, but was expecting this from other reviews. 
The shower head could not be moved up and down, which is quite annoying for someone as tall as me wanting to wash their hair. 
The tap in bathroom splashed water everywhere - it just needs a filter/mesh fitted to stop this! (Very easy to fix). 
No sockets by the bed to charge phone etc, the lamp plugs are not normal UK plugs and as such could not keep phone on bedside overnight. 
Noisy from construction and dlr, but that needs to be expected. 
No fridge/mini bar. 
Old thin towels that are due an upgrade as the rest of the hotel. Towels should be nice and fluffy in hotels, not scratch your skin.
But all over I would stay again, and recommend if comfortability isn’t of the essence - it’s good value for money, just don’t expect a palace!

Made me think my room was either unprepared or didn't exist. Staff were persistent that i wasn't staying in my room!

Name: Anonymous

The front desk receptionists are hit and miss : some are friendlier than others, some don't speak english that well - but they get the job done.
The Consierge was ok, helped us book a shuttle to the airport.
Negative:
No fridge in the room, I haven't seen this at any other 4 star hotel.
In our room, the a/c didn't work, they offered a room replacement the next day, but we decided to take a portable heater just out of fear of landing in a room that had other issues.
There was no way of airing the room, although due to poor isolation wind and cold was coming in...
In the hallway maintenance employees were painting the walls which made the air really bad in some mornings.
Regarding the breakfast, the coffee was not that good a d in some days the fruits were kind of bad.

Name: Anonymous
Review_title: Short but not so sweet stay!
Positive: The location and the views from the room. The Manager
Negative: The breakfast and Dinner was terrible. Cold and flavourless especially for the price. TV guide on the remote control did not work. Sheets were not changed for 3 days. Brought two glasses to the room from the bar on the 1st night of our stay and they stayed in the room for the 3 days almost as if the cleaners refused to remove them despite being empty which is not the point. The manager is very nice tho I just feel he is having to pick up the pieces of a very dated hotel which has the potential to be superb.

Name: Anonymous
Positive: Everything else

Name: Anonymous
Review_title: Convenient for O2 and good value for money
Positive: We were awarded a suite on arrival, which was just a larger room situated up a spiral staircase. The room was enormous considering there was a double bed in it (the room would have suited a king size). A table and 2 armchairs a desk and dressing table did not fill the remaining space. Access to the balcony allowed views across the wharf to London and other parts of Canary Wharf. Being a weekend, there was no construction noise from the area right next door. The furnishings are a little dated but the bed was very comfortable! The bathroom appeared to be recently refurbished but needed some final touches on floor tiles and the door hinges creaked dreadfully every time it was moved. Breakfast was an additional £10 per person and was great value for money, tasty and the hot buffet had hot food, regularly re-filled.
Negative: The only downfall was the grumpy bar staff at 10pm who initially declined to make cocktails as there were too many people queueing (you had to wait in line extending out of the bar and into the seating area) He also declined to use the coffee barista bar for hot chocolate or tea as it was being cleaned for morning drinks ("people wanting hot drinks at this time of night"). For a hotel in London at 10pm, we thought this was a poor reaction! Even if mainly for business clients during the week, it was obviously extremely busy with tourists at the weekend. It seemed that everything around Canary Wharf closed down at this time, so getting a drink elsewhere was not an option - surely the hotel management could meet with residents requests for drinks without complaint?

Name: Anonymous
Positive: There is an old-school, faded grandeur about The Britannia which is quite endearing. It has a nice situation overlooking the water and the room was clean and spacious. The bed was comfortable. Check-in and check-out was efficient.
Negative: It is not the most conveniently situated, the walk from Canary Wharf not straightforward unless you know it and disrupted by works. Parts of the hotel are a little tatty now. It was clearly quite the business when it opened, but broken lift lights, slightly shabby finishes all give the impression of gentle neglect. Temperature control in the room wasn't great for those of us who like a slightly cooler room. Breakfast is OK for what it is, but nothing to write home about. The Wi-Fi is only free for twenty minutes in rooms.

Name: Anonymous
Review_title: I will not be staying again despite the price and location unless it undergoes a thorough refurb
Positive:
Location - South Quay DLR Station 800m walk away in safe area - Had stayed in this hotel previously when attending London 2012 Olympics because of it's location.
Price of accommodation
Car parking, although pricey at £21 a day.
Negative:
Greeted by two female trainee receptionists that neither made eye contact or acknowledged arrival of a person in front of them -that creates a shocking impression from the start. Not busy with other check in customers either. Eye contact, smile, "Good afternoon, welcome to the Britannia International, please give me one moment!" Check in took forever.
Bar area has gaffa tape on the seats. Ordered a club sandwich - poor standard. Came with a hard boiled egg cut up on it and soggy toast. Worst club sandwich ever received and as a result did not have any further food in the hotel. 
Rooms dark with old decor, and especially now new skyscraper blocks being built opposite, blocking light as well. 
Bed mattress very uncomfortable. Bathroom ok but needs a jolly good tile white grout update. 
Back in 2012 the hotel was starting to look dated and shabby but for the price was acceptable. 
2018 and nothing looks to have been done to update.

The staff were knowledgeable and polite but not particularly friendly and there was no flexibility - felt a bit like dealing with robots. No extra effort made to help guests.

Name: Anonymous
Positive: The staff, they were trying their hardest even though they were under manned, under trained and maintaining a positive attitude overall.
Negative:
-Shower Curtain smelt horrible
-The shower went from hot to cold water
-I paid for a double room and received 2 single mattresses together. I explained to reception and was told this is what a double bed is, I argued back saying it's not a double bed, it's two single beds. 
-The furniture looks like it's been pulled out of a tip, scratched and damaged.
-The carpets and wallpaper are disgusting.
-The breakfast had so much oil on it I was on the lookout for the US army.
-The view from the window was obscured by the amount of grime stuck to it. They haven't seen a good scrub since the 1990's.
-2x 9 inch cheese pizzas arrive 90 minutes later, cold, undercooked and looked like a pre school student made it in their first week of cooking class.
-Overall this hotel has a lot of potential, especially the old fashioned decor if it was taken care of by a team of carpenters and the carpets/wallpaper were replaced but whoever's is leading the upper management of this company is either deliberity running it into the ground or is severely incompetent. 
Never again will I stay in a Hotel from this chain.

Name: Anonymous
Review_title: Appalling, a massive drop in standards for a hotel that I once quite liked.
Positive: Glad to get out of there
Negative:
The first room smelt of smoke, it was so close to the road, that a generator from nearby building work was very loud in the room, even during the night. I asked to move rooms, given the smell and the noise. We ended up in a very dilapidated room, lots of things were hanging off, such as wall paper, decorations. It looked like they had decided not to fix the bathroom after some renovations, and just put a shower curtain up to cover things.
There was parking at the hotel, you couldn’t pay by card, so yes, I had to put £25 in pound coins into the parking meter. When I got inside the hotel, there was a second parking meter, it also did not accept card payment.
There were a lot of building, roadworks and road closures. It would have been helpful to have known this before hand as it did limit access.

Name: Anonymous
Positive: Our room was filthy. A bag of rubbish was left from the previous guests. My sons bed sheets were stained. The carpets were dirty. The curtains were hanging off the rails. A family of 4. One double bed and a sofa. Was told it would be looked into, never was. A sofa, not a sofa bed. No bedding for children.

Name: Anonymous
Positive: Our location within the hotel was very quiet.
Negative:
We were travelling to London for a conference over the weekend which started early on Thursday morning, meaning we had to be up at 3am, travelling for 6 hours to then arrive in London in time to attend the beginning. This meant that we requested early check-in between 8-9am (check in was requested a week prior to visit) from the hotel, which was confirmed by the hotel. It was also stated in the email that it would be FREE OF CHARGE. We arrived at the hotel between 9-9:30am to be told there were no rooms and were asked to wait for half an hour for a room to possibly be free. We then asked again about a room after half an hour and was told by a different member of staff there were no rooms. We explained our situation again and nothing was done to accommodate or help us in any way, we were just told that there were no rooms at that time and that we could wait until 11/12pm if we wanted to. By this point we were already an hour late to the start of the conference so we weren’t very happy, especially considering I tried to show both members of staff the early check in confirmation and neither of them seemed interested. After another 15 minutes of frustrated waiting I went back to the front desk to speak to the first member of staff. I was polite, calm and apologetic about being so pushy but again explained that we really needed a room as we had somewhere to be, and that it wasn’t fair for them to confirm early check in if it was not going to be provided for us. She then went to speak to her manager and we were finally given a room, but not before she asked that I pay a £10 extra early check-in fee for a request that I was told would be free of charge.
When arriving at the room, it was underground which was not really an issue as we did request a room without a window, but we could get no service or internet connection while in the room which was inconvenient.

Name: Anonymous

Negative:
I think the furniture in the rooms and around the hotel needs updating as it was very very dated. I recommend maybe going for a modern theme!

I didn't feel comfortable in the bathroom either. There was a rubber mat to prevent you slipping, however there was markings on the floor of the bath tub so why the need for the extra mat? 
 I looked at the menu and saw that a traditional English breakfast was on offer for £15. I had a look at what was on offer and the food looked awful! I overhead guests asking for a more continental breakfast but this option wasn't avaliable. I decided to eat elsewhere.

Name: Anonymous
Positive: The location.

Firstly, the booking was difficult the hotel said I had booked for a single room wen clearly I was with my partner an expected us to stay on a single bed. Secondly, the staff were extremely rude about it the manager was nice and sorted everything out as we requested a refund after travelling for 2 hours in the car we had to find somewhere else to stay at 10pm. Thirdly, after agreeing to a refund we saw a group of 4 in front of us where the same mistake was made for them and they had to stay there. 
Now for the room, it was filthy, the bathroom was jus over a foot long. The room was dark and smelt awful. The bed had the cheapest linen and it was dirty. What is even worse is that the night before we spent the same amount to stay at the Raddison Blu which was incredible. I’m sorry, but we will not be booking here again.

Name: Anonymous
Review_title: Terrible experience at this hotel. Avoid it like the plague
Positive: I am an experienced traveler. I can’t say if there is anything I particularly like. I guess located walking distance to underground and Canada Place mall was a positive.
Negative: The air conditioning in my room did not work. First night it was 23 C despite the thermostat being set at 19 C. I complained to the front desk/reception next morning. Returned in the evening and now temperature was 24 C. Complained again to tue front desk/reception the following morning. Came back in the evening the temp was now at 25 C. Went down to front desk/reception and this time asked to speak with the duty manager. Amat (duty manager) first did not believe me and on my insistence went up to the room with me. Saw it with his own eyes. Had no explanation but told me it was taken care off. Then he went on to tell me I was wrong and became rude, loud aggressive and use abusive language. Started using curse words (including F**k you). I gave up. Next morning I spoke with Rodolpo the morning duty manager. He was nice and promised to take care of it. He did offer a table fan. When I came back the temp was now 26 and table dan did not work. Finally I fave up and checked out of the hotel two days earlier because it was unbearable. I was staying with my almost 90 year old father and it became dangerous.

Name: Anonymous
Positive:
Extensive renovation and roadworks immediately outside of which we were not aware when booking. Long wait in line at check in with unsympathetic staff. Room shabby and in need of redecoration. Shower inadequate. Ridiculously small single beds - a double size unzipped into 2- which were of cheap quality and with springs visible through cover, meaning a night with no sleep and early checkout to another hotel. 
Do not go!
Negative: Everything except location. Will not use Britannia hotels again.

Breakfast is the worst part: croissant not freshly baked, limited choice, the coffee smell like burned and even the hot milk smells the same and generally very low quality of the row materials. Name: Anonymous
Positive: View from room was generator, very noisy outside. , non smoking room smelt of cigarettes. Dinner very poor choice as looked like frozen desserts served on shop packaging.quite a walk from tube station. Wifi was only free in lobby otherwise had to pay.

Name: Anonymous
Positive:
1. The bed was very comfy. Nice pillows.
2. The reception was very posh, but I'd rather have nice rooms then nice reception.
Negative:
1. There was no free WiFi. I was under the impression when booking they would provide free WiFi but no. The staff said it's free in the lobby but it didn't even work there.
2. There is construction work all around the hotel and in the hotel. I wasn't informed of this so again, booking the hotel due to it being so close then finding out once arriving in London it's a 20 minute walk when it was advertised as 3 minutes is not good. Also the construction was very noisy, not to be helped but not great.
3. The cleaning was inadequate. Our bedsheets were changed once throughout our 4 night stay, there was hardly any toilet paper and the staff left a Yours magazine in the room on the last night. I don't want to pay £500 for staff to leave their own rubbish in the room.
4. I ordered a twin room, but on arrival the room has 2 single beds pushed together to make a double. Every day we had to push the beds apart but housekeeping kept pushing them back.
5. Lack of plug sockets. There was none next to the bed so to set am alarm you had to get out and walk across the other side of the room. most of the sockets are not UK plugs. The hairdryer was plugged in through the drawer which makes it unusable.
6. Decor old. The furniture was very run down, wood peeling on the furniture and wallpaper heavily marked.

Positive:

Another 10 pound on top of the staying price. Bed was not a full double but 2 singles. Bedding did not smell clean. Bathroom needed alot of work. Facilities not great. Freeze dried coffee. Not even a name. All these things make a difference. Although did get upgraded to a room with a window for free
Windows were dirty
Negative: Property wasn't up to date. Needed alot of work doing. Wires hanging out in the lift! Lobby was dirty. Finger marks all over glass doors. Plates left for hours on floor on lift lobby..

Name: Anonymous
Positive:
The location had been conveniently located to subway and 2 DLR stations. 
Rooms were spacious enough and although old and tired sufficiently sanitised and clean. Staff tried to be accommodating.
Negative:
No value for money- Paid 154 pounds for 1 night for a standard room with a window with view on a wall. Although the hotel stay was paid in advance and I provided copy of the bank transfer, they also asked to pre-authorise my card otherwise they didn't allow access to the room because they haven't ''physically received the amount of money to their bank account''. Stuffy, outdated rooms with very tired and worn out surfaces. Poor toilet flush. Bad experience also with the car service the concierge booked for me- driver left me to a wrong destination and was about to miss the airport flight. 
The easiest way to reach the hotel from the Canary Wharf underground station had been through the building of the Obica restaurant.

Name: Zagidat
Positive: Отель точно не для тех кто впервые едет знакомиться с городом , скорее для деловых людей без лишних требований к жизни и условиям . Интернет ужасный и платный , завтрак не плохой , Мебель старая как и ремонт, но тут и цена самая низкая в Лондоне среди больших отелей , мы ехали на 9 ночей и хорошо что только на 2 дня предварительно забронировали , дальше переехали в 5 звёзд и прекрасно отдохнули . Не скажу что плохой отель , скорее для рабочего народа , точно не для релакса , номера без окон и пока мы поднимали уровень номера цена конечного оказалась равной 5 звёздочному отелю , чего он явно не стоит и мы съехали .

Name: Marat_aysin
Positive:
Отель купил ценой (ехали в командировку + немного времени на себя) . Были в номере "эконом", потом взяли представительский. Расположение на троечку из-за ремонта прямо напротив отеля, но до метро добраться легко и относительно быстро. До центра на метро буквально минут 30. Хорошие, но однообразные завтраки и неплохой кофе, стилизован отель под ретро стиль с панорамными окнами в ресторанах. В соседнем отеле хороший бар на крыше, рекомендую сходить ради видов.
Также стоит отметить возможность быстрой выписки (т.к. все в отеле нерасторопно) и весьма хороший сервис консьержа (помогли забронировать тур, т.к. не могли сделать онлайн). Стоит отметить, что в номере чисто, звукоизоляция не идеальная, но выспаться можно, в номере есть фен, гладильная доска и чайник с пакетиками чая и кофе. В номераъ относительно тепло, но в эконом отсутствуют обогреватели (вроде как можно попросить)

Frühstück:
Man bekommt das Frühstück beim Check-Inn preiswerter angeboten, danach kostet es mehr. Also nimmt man es gleich und ist enttäuscht.. (kein frisches Gemüse und Obst). Wurst war schon grau ..

Name: Clara
Review_title: Habitación amplia, limpia, con baño privado y buenas vistas
Positive:
Para ser Londres no está mal de precio, no está en el centro, pero está al lado de una línea de metro que te lleva a todo lo que quieres ver en 10 minutos. Sin duda lo recomendaría, pero no recomendaría para nada pagar por el desayuno que ofrece el hotel, 13 libras es demasiado para la calidad de los productos que ofrecen. A no ser que quieras desayunar como los ingleses huevos, salchichas, pescado, patatas fritas,...
 Alrededor hay muchas cafeterías donde seguramente se pueda desayunar a un precio más económico

Name: Manfred
Review_title: Für Leute, die ein altes,sauberes und günstiges Hotel schätzen. Für U-Bahn-Möger.
Positive: Das Britannia ist sehr sauber, Zimmer war grosszügig, alt aber sauber. Das Personal ist am Desk sehr freundlich, beim Morgenbuffet eher weniger. Frühstücksbuffet typisch englisch und reichhaltige Auswahl. Kaffee geht gerade so. Lage ist gerade so ok, weil entfernt vom Zentrum und im Geschäftsviertel der Canary Wharf. Mit Sub in ca. 11 Min im Zentrum, deshalb okay. Canary Wharf ist Banken- und Geschäftsviertel, daher abends ausgestorben. Nähe zur U-Bahnstation ist 5 Min. zu Fuss. Preis-Leistungsverhältnis ist super. Lifte sind alt und langsam.

Name: Petra
Review_title: Besser als erwartet, da die Kritiken zum Großteil recht negativ waren. Würde dort wieder buchen
Positive: Sehr nah zur Tube Jubilee Line, mit der man ganz schnell im Zentrum (Bank, Waterloo, Green Park) ist. Mit der DLR ist man in wenigen Minuten in Greenwich. Im Jubelee Park, einem Einkaufszentrum, das unmittelbar an der Tubestation liegt, kann man prima und in Ruhe shoppen, nahezu rund um die Uhr etwas essen (Nandoos, Asiate, Sushi...) und Geld aus dem Automaten ziehen. Das Hotel selbst hat mich positiv überrascht - der morbide Charme wurde ja schon von anderen erwähnt. Wenn man keinen Luxus erwartet und einen die eine oder andere zerbrochen Fliese im Bad oder ein wackeliges Bett nicht stören, für den ist das Hotel eine wirklich gute Wahl. Einchecken, auschecken, Koffer bei Ankunft morgens ins Deposit geben – das alles hat gut und rasch funktioniert. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Gefrühstückt haben wir nicht im Hotel, in London kann man das prima unterwegs tun. Auch gibt es in der Shopping Mall nette Cafés, u.a. ein Starbucks Café, wer mag. Etwa 100 Meter entfernt ist ein passabler Inder, gegenüber ein kleiner Supermarkt mit guten/normalen Preisen, wenn man etwa Wasser kaufen will. Das Leitungswasser schmeckt nicht.

Además los empleados y gerentes de administración nos ayudaron muchísimo en las necesidades que tuvimos. Muy amables.

Das Shopping Center das sich in unmittelbarer Nähe befindet, und die Restaurants in der Umgebung die allesamt sehr gutes Essen servieren. Die Bar serviert gute Drinks und der spät nächtliche Pizzaservice kann sich sehen lassen. Wir lieben Pizza.

Die Superior Zimmer sind ok und entsprechen dem 4-Stern Standard (nicht so die Standard Zimmer)
Badezimmer ist neu und sauber. 
Es ist alles sauber. Es gibt aber den typisch englischen Teppichboden. Das muss man mögen.
Bett ist gut und sauber.
Gute Erreichbarkeit mit der U-Bahn. 
Nach einer Beschwerde (siehe nicht gefallen) wurde rasch und unbürokratisch reagiert.

Review_title: Alles in allem - noch dazu als 4-Sterne-Hotel - "nur" ein Mittelklassehotel.

Auch bei einem mehrtägigen Aufenthalt ist die Zimmergröße noch okay. Das Badezimmer ist (auf Wunsch täglich) mit frischen Handtüchern und Duschgel etc. ausgestattet. Das Personal an der Rezeption und im Frühstücksraum sind ausgesprochen freundlich. Gelegen ist das Hotel ca. 5 Minuten zu den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln.

Nos dieron un habitación, más o menos lo que esperabamos. Nos ponía poco jabón para la ducha. Teníamos que pedirlo.
La gran estafa está en el desayuno. Hasta el año pasado era un buffet muy variado y excelente. En cambio, esta vez no tenía nada, sólo el desayuno inglés grasiento. No frutas (solo piña en almibar), no jamón, no queso. Faltaba muchas cosas. Eso sí, nos cobraron unas 13 libras por persona y desayuno. UN ROBO

Name: Rui
Review_title: Boa relação qualidade preço mas, com pequenas obras pode melhorar muito.
Positive: É um Hotel onde o charme ainda está presente, com amplas zonas comuns, bares e uma vista deslumbrante sobre os modernos prédios de Canary Wharf. Fica muito perto de uma estação de Metro e outra de Tramway o que facilita muito a chegada ao centro de Londres. Tinhamos reservado um quarto sem janela mas, na recepção trocaram-nos para uma penthouse no 11 º andar com amplas janelas e banheira de hidromassagem.

Positive: L'emplacement, Canary Wharf. Sauf que ma chambre était très mal située. J'attendais toutes les musiques lorsqu'il y avait une fête en bas au RDC. De plus elle est située juste à côté des stocks des femmes de chambre. J'ai été souvent réveillé par leur vacarme. Lorsque je me suis plaint, on m'avait promis de m'envoyer plus haut en compensation, malheureusement on m'a proposé à ma surprise au même étage une chambre plus petite et il faisait froid à l'intérieur. Donc j'ai préféré garder la première chambre 176.

Not happy at all. I don’t recommend this place.

Name: Mara
Positive: Felicissima ed entusiasta di raccontare la mia esperienza. Londra è già di per se fantastica contro ogni aspettativa. Prima di partire non sapevo delle emozioni che avrei vissuto. Una volta arrivata ho scoperto quella che è diventata la mia zona preferita, Canary Wharf, ed è qui che si trovava il mio hotel. Scopriamo in modo del tutto aspettato che probabilmente non avremmo mai visitato questa zona se non fosse stato per il nostro hotel e rimaniamo di stucco davanti alla bellezza. L’hotel, che dire, meraviglioso in tutti i suoi particolari. Per non parlare della vista che dalla camera da sul ponte, vi metto qui qualche foto. Esperienza unica. Consigliatissimo!

Elle n’a pas voulu répondre à mes questions concernant l’hotel et la ville. Elle nous a pas indiqué l’ascenseur. J’ai demandé un adapteur à la réception/conciergerie mais les personnes m’ont dit clairement qu’il faut payer 5€ pour ça alors que partout dans le monde où je voyage c’est gratuit de prêter lors de séjour. Beaucoup de bruits dans la nuit dans les couloirs qui m’a empêcher de dormir.

Positive:
Ci è stata assegnata una camera situata nei sotterranei dell'hotel, due piani sotto la reception.
La camera era dotata di un sistema di areazione molto rumoroso e tale da provocare vibrazioni nella testiera del letto.
La stanza era priva di connessione internet e telefonica, nonché di riduttori elettrici di tipo europeo.
Gli stessi sono stati forniti dalla reception a pagamento, al costo di 5 sterline cadauno.
Rapporto qualità/prezzo assolutamente inadeguato.

Name: Kirsten
Review_title: Gemütlicher Aufenthalt in einem beindruckendem Umfeld.
Positive:
Das Hotel liegt in Canary Wharf - Londons neuem Finanzzentrum.
Da wir zu einer Veranstaltung auf der Isle of Dogs wollten, war der Hotelstandort optimal.
Optimaler ist das Hotel allerdings für Geschäftsreisende, die in Canary Wharf tätig sind.
Das Hotel ist trotz seiner Größe gemütlich & sehr gepflegt, mit sehr nettem Personal.
Wer in die Londoner City möchte, hat sehr gute Verbindungen mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln.
Das Hotel-Umfeld ist aufgrund der spektakulären Architektur des Finanzzentrums sehr sehenswert.

Positive: Konnte keine Mails oder WhatsApp raus schicken weil mein Server das Netz zu unsicher fand. Internet im Zimmer gab es nur für 2x 20 Minuten. Die Klospülung funktionierte nicht. Von 3 Fahrstühlen funktionierte einer gar nicht, in einem anderen bin ich zweimal stecken geblieben.

Name: Alicejane
Positive: Non mi e piaciuto il fatto che la mia prenotazione fatta piu di una settimana prima del check in e stata cancellata dopo l arario di inizio check in. Questa cosa e'assurda! Ho parlato con l hotel per cercare di capire come mai la mia carta non e' stata approvata e se avessi avuto la possibilita di prenotare un uleriore stanza ma mi e' stato detto che tutte le camere erano occupate. Io immediatamente ho visto su booking.com e c erano camere diponibili cosi l ho riprenotata li. Poi ho pagato per una camera con finestra ma mi e' stata data una camera con finestra bloccata (non si poteva aprire!) che finestra e'???? Dopo aver pagato una camera 70pounds a notte per persona mi dite come si fa a non dare una camera pulitissima?? Totalmente contro!

Non lo consiglio a nessuno!

La colazione era sufficiente, ma da un hotel 4 stelle è lecito aspettarsi molto di più sia in termini di presentazione (la marmellata era in forma di blocco gelatinoso da 1 kg in una zuppiera), sia in termini di varietà (in pratica solo English Breakfast).
La posizione invece era decisamente gradevole. Bella zona, ben servita da mezzi di trasporto.

Name: Alex
Positive:
Het ontbijt was zeer matig. Het brood (dat nauwelijks aanwezig was) was oud.
De kamer die wij hadden was zeer slecht onderhouden (behang los, e.d ) verder kon het aanwezige raam niet dicht omdat dit defect was. De bedden waren ronduit slecht. De veren prikten in onze ruggen. Bij het inchecken moesten mijn vrouw en ik ongeveer 3 kwartier in de rij om in te kunnen checken.

Positive: Pas grand choses. La localisation. Pres des transports en commun

Name: Irini
Positive:
Für den Preis hätte ich noch ein Auge zugedrückt für die ranzig heruntergekommene Ausstattung angeht, da die Lage top ist, ABER an unserem letzten Tag dort bzw morgen wachte ich auf und das ganze Zimmer stand unter Wasser! Ich dachte ich träume!! Das wasser kam aus dem Bad und ich checkte sowohl Badewanne als auch das Waschbecken , ob wir irgendetwas übersehen hatten über Nacht- aber Fehlanzeige!!!Als ich mein Problem an der Rezeption schilderte, ließ man uns warten. Dann kam ein Handwerker und meinte gleich , dass wir die Kosten tragen müssen, sofern er nichts Defektes findet. Und was war? Alles im angeblich einwandfreien Zustand. Ich bat den Hotelmanager dazu, der aus seinem Büro hinter der Rezeption hervorkam und behauptete im Zimmer gewesen zu sein und Papier aus dem Waschbecken gezogen zu haben , welches das (leere!!!) Waschbecken zum überlaufen brachte und somit den Schaden verursachte.Ich fragte ihn ob es neuerdings in Hotelzimmern hier regnet oder wie sich sowas denn ereignen soll und wir nichtmal Zellstoff in unserem Besitz hatten bzw diesen auch gar benutzen, da wir Handtücher haben? Wie kann es sein, dass das Waschbecken leer ist und trocken morgens und der gesamte Boden geflutet? Und ob er ernsthaft göaubt wir verstopfen das Waschbecken freiwillig , lassen dann den Wasserhahn über Nacht noch laufen, weils Spass macht nur um 200 Pfund leichter zu werden, oder was? Auf diese Fragen wusste er komischerweise keine Antwort...Das Personal war unmotiviert und desinteressiert, wenige Damen an der Rezeption trotz den Missständen des Hotels bemüht..
Jetzt werden uns von der Kreditkarte 200 Pfund abgezogen, um den Teppich zu ersetzen(m -eine bodenlose Frechheit so verarscht zu werden!!!

Positive: fakten: das britannia hat eine schmitzige fassade, defekte stufen, das zimmer wurde nicht gereinigt, teppiche ausgefranst, türrahmen hatten risse, schmutzige fenster, der eingang sah definitiv besser tage, eine nicht regelbare klimaanlage , und der geruch von altem nassen hund . alles in allem kommt noch eine baustelle des „wardian“ dazu. mit allem respekt, aber das hotel verdient keine 4 sterne. ein gast der sich bei der ankunft übergeben musste hinterliess 1h erbrochenes im äusseren eingangsbereich. ich bin sehr enttäuscht das dieses haus es nicht mehr wert ist einen gehobenen stand zu repräsentieren. das bad enthielt lose fugen, eine halbfest montierte seifenschale, und kafeetassen, sowie paperkorb mussten erst demonstrativ auf einentisch gestellt werden damit gereinigt wurde. für den preis kann ich das hotel nicht mehr empfehlen, da auch das frühstück mit wässrigem rührei, halbwarmen würstchen, einer sorte schnittkäse und winer lage kochschinken eher lowest class war.

Name: Svetlana
Positive: При бронирования мы специально указали что хотим номер с видом на реку, чтоб сделать красивые фотографии.нам пришло уведомление что пожелание учтено ,и дополнительная плата взыматься не будет. В итоге номер был с видом на крышу. И когда мы попросили поменять номер сотрудник нам грубо указал что мы бронировали номер а не вид. В таки случае мы могли бы взять номер без окна , который стоит на много дешевле.

Name: André
Positive:
Preis-Leistung-Verhältnis ist absolut passend. Das Hotel hat britischen Charme. Man sieht, dass es etwas in die Jahre gekommen ist, was jedoch kein Problem darstellt. Die Angestellten geben sich viel Mühe, einem einen angenehmen Aufenthalt zu ermöglichen. Canary Wharf ist ein Bankenviertel, sodass es hier eher ruhig zu- & hergeht. Die Anbindung mit ÖNPV ist sehr gut, mit der Jubilee-Line ab Canary Wharf oder mit der DLR ab Heron Quays ist man in ein paar Minuten mitten in London. Alternativ fahren auch Busse.
Aktuell wird, wie überall in London auch in Canary Wharf viel gebaut, was jedoch nicht gross stört, es wird vor allem in die Höhe gebaut.

Name: Mircea
Review_title: Cel mai prost hotel din viata mea.
Positive:
Conform booking.com camera trebuia sa aiba 24 mp in realitate a avut cel mult 14 mp. Camera insalubra cu pereti deteriorati, murdari, crapati etc. Din tavan venea permanent un jet de aer rece care nu ptea fi oprit, reglat si care producea mult zgomot extrem de deranjant noaptea. Am reclamat fara succes insa. Baia avea clante ruginite robinet defect si murdar.
Este cel mai rau hotel in care am stat in viata mea, nu cred ca poate fi clasificat nici la 1*
According to booking.com the camera had to have 24 square meters in reality had a maximum of 14 square meters. The room was terrible with damaged, dirty, cracked walls. From the ceiling there was always a cold air that could not be stopped, set and produced a lot of disturbing noise at night. But I unsuccessfully complained. The bathroom had rusty clogs, faint and dirty tap.
It's the worst hotel I've ever been in my life, I do not think it can be classified at 1 *

Positive: Super rapport qualité prix (58€/nuit)! Pour ce prix-là, impossible d'être déçu. La salle de bain était grande (avec baignoire) et la chambre spacieuse également. Le lit aurait pu être plus confortable (matelas à ressorts) mais aucun souci pour passer une bonne nuit. Hôtel très calme ce soir-là.

Bilderna var inte alls som i verkligheten . 
Det stod att man skulle ha wi-fi 20 *2 per dag var ingen information som man fick alls. 
Personalen var inte trevliga och ej hjälpsamma kunde ej svara på frågor . 
Vi var inte nöjda i överhuvudtaget . 
Dessutom så hade man en byggplast precis utanför fönstret . 
Skulle aldrig åka tillbaka till det hotellet . 
Till och med möblerna var tejpade med svart tejp 
Har nog varit ett fint hotell för typ 20 år sedan .

Name: Tom
Review_title: Vælger et andet hotel en anden gang
Positive:
Ventede mere end 2 timer på at check ind Mandag d. 03. juni 2019 grundet IT problemer. Der var ingen back-up procedure og ikke megen information. Et tilbud om en kop kaffe eller lign., lidt imødekommenhed og information ville have afbødet situationen - og ikke kostet hotellet noget. Nu blev det bare en kedelig oplevelse!
Der er relativt lydt på hotellet, hvilket er problemetisk når man skal op på arbejde dagen efter.
Morgenmaden er temmelig kedelig og der er ikke det stor udvalg. Den udskårne frugt var sammenfalden, kedeligt og så ud som om den havde været på bordet dagen før også.

Name: Tania
Positive:
Très joli endroit pour un très bon prix.
J'ai tout adoré, franchement l'hôtel est bien situé, propre, joli...

Name: Kruchkov
Positive: wifi

Name: Luis9b
Positive: La limpieza, muy limpio.

Name: Jéssica
Positive:
Fiz um depósito em dinheiro como garantia e eles falaram que me devolveria no
Checkout e isso não ocorreu! Enviei mensagem
e não obtive resposta!

Name: Andreas
Positive: Frühstück war gut, abgesehen vom Instantkaffee. Die Bar ist auch gemütlich, wie das gesamte Hotel. Ist aber ziemlich in die Jahre gekommen und alles deutlich verschlissen. Die Preise waren für London ok.

Name: Teresa
Review_title: Okay aber definitiv keine vier Sterne
Positive: Aufzüge gingen super schnell, Rezeption hat alle Fragen beim Check-in freundlich beantwortet, Lage ist in Ordnung und Supermarkt und kleines Café in 3 Minuten zu Fuß erreichbar.

Name: Jorge
Review_title: Un hotel con una calidad que no corresponde con los tiempos ni con el lugar donde está ubicado.
Positive: Canary Wharf es un sitio excelente. Si bien la zona del hotel está en obras y el acceso es farragoso. Eso no es culpa de ellos, pero dificulta el acceso.

Name: Xue
Positive: 办理入住很快

Name: Suzana
Positive: Do quarto, espaçoso

Name: Walter
Positive: Geen uitgesproken positieve zaken te vermelden over dit hotel.

Name: Mara
Positive:
Não havia um único funcionário da recepção, que falasse outra língua, além do inglês. 
Cama de casal super estreita.

Name: Pierpaolo
Review_title: Tutto perfetto e senza sorprese... (A parte l'aspetto "wi-fi")
Positive: Ottima posizione, servita da mezzi pubblici (metro e Dlr) agevoli i collegamenti con il centro. Bell'albergo molto grande, stanze ampie con servizi in camera, colazione all'inglese decisamente soddisfacente, personale di servizio attento e puntuale, pronto alle richieste

Name: Alena
Positive: S lokalitou jsme počítali, ale že bude výhled z hotelu přímo staveniště nikoli, což je však dočasná záležitost. Lokalita velmi moderní s nákupním centrem a restauracemi ve starých docích. Dostupnost k parlamentu 12 min metrem. Blízko přístav , ale ne všechny společnosti zde staví. Pokoje prostorné, klasicky zařízené, velmi čisto. Snídaně bohatá anglická, s fazolemi a slaninou mj. a výhledem na vodu. Celkově vše OK.

Name: Pedro
Positive: La ubicacion

Name: António
Positive: O pequeno almoço era bom, e o jantar ao estilo buffet facilitou.

Name: Johannes
Positive:
Locatie prima . Snel bij underground

Name: José
Positive: La cama comoda

Name: Robert
Positive: Dość dobra lokalizacja, chociaż na wieczorny wypad do pubu to w najbliższej okolicy nie bardzo. Ale kawałek dalej już nad kanałem coś było, a metrem zawsze można podjechać. No i zawsze można było skorzystać z baru na dole :)

Name: Pedro

Name: Paweł

Name: Jan
Review_title: Hervorragendes Hotel, günstig für 4 Sternehotel in London
Positive: Englischer Stil, Bars und Snacks zu jeder Zeit, hervorragende Lage, sehr nettes und kompetentes Personal, sehr gutes englisches Frühstück. Die rustikalen Möbel / Einrichtungsstil, für Londoner Verhältnisse sehr günstige Barpreise (Bier, Cocktails)

Name: ひかる
Positive: 近くにショッピングセンターがある

Name: Dominika
Positive: Dobra lokalizacja, czyste pokoje, świetna obsługa hotelowa

Name: Игорь
Positive: Начнем с того что очень красивый отель, и особенно хочу поблагодарить Администратора Александру, вежливая приятная, учтивая девушка и говорит по русски)) самый лучший админ из всех отелей которые я видел. Номер шикарный выше всех похвал с видом на Темзу, в номере есть все и система установки температуры в номере и телек и ванная и даже фен и сушилка и утюг и гладильная доска а ещё каждый день оставляют кофе сахар м чай ах да чайник тоже есть. Лифт ждём максиму 20 секунд так что не трындите что очереди , там три лифта 20 секунд подождать може. Аспллжение отеля шикарное !!! Везде места отдыха !!! Спасибо отелю за чудесный отдых!!!

Name: Samir
Positive: De locatie.

Name: Horia
Positive: Le personnel est vraiment incroyable, très sympa, surtout les 2 du bar. Excellent rapport qualité prix, je reviendrai avec plaisir

Positive: Este hotel necessita remodelação urgente, não entendo como Londres permite um hotel tao em desuso, talvez porque não se encontram mais na comunidade europeia

Name: Marina

Positive:

Name: X
Positive: Obsługa tragiczna, mój pokój który zarezerwowałem był niedostępny. Pan z recepcji praktycznie nie udzielił mi żadnych informacji o hotelu. Rozlieczenie z hotelem było sporym problemem, pobrali napoczątku 1/3 z całości ceny (w celach jedynie autoryzacyjnych) po czym w obiekcie kazali płacić 100%. Faktura była oczywiście z błędem...

Name: Laurent
Positive: L'hotel est bien situé dans un quartier moderne et en évolution, notre réceptionniste native de Marseilles, maitrise naturellement le Français. Le parking un peu cher mais pratique. La proposition gratuite d'obtenir une chambre avec fenetre.

La posizione è un po’ lontana dal centro ma la stazione della metro a 5 minuti a piedi permette di raggiungere le attrazioni più importanti in pochissimo tempo!

Name: Thérène
Positive: L'hôtel propre dans le calme, personnel très sympathique nickel rien à dire ! Le plus, l'hôtel est à 5mn du métro et la ligne dessert le centre ville en 10 voir 15mn on y est top.

Name: Behnaz
Positive:
Das Bett ist Hinrunde her gerutscht viel zu alt
Badezimmer renovierungsbedürftig
Teppich im Zimmer gerissen teilweise und dreckig. Ich muss nicht nochmals hin

Name: Nathalie
Positive:
Les propositions de restauration pour tous les goûts et à tous les prix.
La proximité du centre de Londres par les transports.

Name: Lavinia
Positive: Posizione perfetta, stanza all'undicesimo piano bellissima con una finestra enorme e vasca idromassaggio. Ottimo prezzo

Positive:
internet a pagamento in camera
mancata insonorizzazione esterna
lavori adiacenti con passaggio scomodo e disagiato

Name: Kristiyan
Positive: “Безплатен WiFi” за 20 Мин на ден, е смешно! Няма какво да се прави на територията на хотела. Много съм разочарован и не бих се излъгал пак да отседна в тази верига хотели. Платих за 4* хотел а се чувствах в хостел...

Name: Jurgen
Review_title: Het slechtste verblijf dat ik mij kan herinneren.
Positive: De kamer was aftands met versleten en vieze, losse vloerbedekking, beschadigde meubels en een naar mijn idee veel te hard bed. Het ergste was de constante temperatuur van 25' in de kamer. De beluchting/airco (?) doet het niet, de ventilator maakt veel lawaai en alle raamscharnieren zijn onklaar gemaakt waardoor de ramen niet open kunnen. Het ontbijt levert, zelfs als aanbieding, een ronduit slechte prijs/kwaliteitsverhouding. De espresso is wateriger dan de slapste koffie, de bacon uitgedroogd, de tomaten tot pap verwarmd, de croissants hadden alleen de vorm etc. etc. Mensen, niet doen en ga buiten het hotel ontbijten of neem een cracker van huis mee. Dit hotel staat naar mijn idee al jaren op de lijst om gesloopt te worden om plaats te maken voor iets nieuws. Net als de naastgelegen hotels die al vernieuwd zijn of nog in aanbouw zijn. Je slaapt hier dan ook op een bouwplaats. Het mag dan nog geen € 100,- kosten maar mijn advies is toch elders te gaan. Schandalig dat dit verhuurd wordt.

Name: Elisabeth
Positive: hatten die Unterkunft nur für eine Übernachtung gebucht, Lage unter der Woche okay, am Wochenende ist nicht viel los in der Umgebung

Name: Roberto
Positive: NULLA

Gute Lage

Name: Marko
Review_title: Neljän tähden hotelli on vain parin tähden arvoinen.
Positive: Huone oli kuin sauna, 24-27 astetta, eikä ilmastointi toiminut lainkaan. Vastaanotosta annettiin tuuletin, joka auttoi hiukan. Aamiainen oli melko huono rasvaisine ruokineen ja kahvi oli tönkköä litkua. Kokolattiamatto oli kulahtanut kaikkialla hotellissa ja muutenkin koko hotellin olemus oli nukkavierun epäsiisti. Sänky oli kova ja loppuun nukuttu. Suurin pettymys mihinkään hotelliin pitkään aikaan, ei missään nimessä neljän tähden hotelli, vaan käytännössä kahden tähden. Ei koskaan enää!!!

La posizione è assolutamente la migliore, si passeggia lungo il fiume con una vista tra i palazzi stupenda, per poi arrivare all'hotel. Ho avuto solo difficoltà a trovarlo il primo giorno perchè alcuni percorsi pedonali erano chiusi per via di lavori ma poi una volta trovato lo Staff mi ha indicato la via migliore a 5 min a piedi dalla stazione metro e DLR. Inoltre si trova in una zona di Londra molto tranquilla e piacevole.
La stanza, visto gli standard a cui ero abituato, mi ha sorpeso perchè era spaziosa anche se per 1 persona; con una bella vista sui grattacieli (vi consiglio di richiedere quando prenotate; se siete soli, una stanza con finestre).

Name: Laura

Elegí este alojamiento por las buenas críticas que tenía en la aplicación de Booking, y no me equivoqué. Aunque estaba un poco alejado, la línea de metro Jubilee te deja en el centro de forma directa, sin tener que hacer transbordo. La calidad de la habitación es muy buena: camas, baño, la entrada... 
Tienes Tescos cerca para hacer compra, tiene restaurantes si no quieres moverte del hotel. 
El camino desde el metro es un poco enrevesado: tienes que cruzar el río por una pasarela, que está escondida detrás de un edificio, pero se hace rápido y sin problema y está bastante concurrida.

Name: Pietro
Positive: La doccia non regolava la temperatura dell'acqua e, nonostante abbia richiesto un intervento, il problema non è stato risolto. Ho soggiornato in una stanza con doppi letti singoli ed ho richiesto che fossero uniti almeno con le lenzuola da letto matrimoniale: nemmeno questa richiesta è stata soddisfatta. Infine, avendo bisogno di un adattatore ho chiesto alla reception se ne vendevano uno. Mi hanno risposto di sì ma solo se lo compravo in moneta e subito, senza darmi la possibilità di pagare con carta o di aggiungerlo al mio conto per la stanza. Non avendo in quel momento del cash sono dovuto uscire e camminare 15 minuti per trovare un posto dove ritirare del contante.

Name: Wahid
Positive:
Etablissement vetuste et sale : De vieux fauteuils dans le salon de
l'hôtel qui vous invitent à fuir, le chauffage dans la chambre ne
fonctionne pas et la télé non plus, du calcaire sur la robinetterie de
la douche, une couche de poussière sur les lampes et même les lits
sentent la poussière !! Mes filles, en visite à Londres pour assister à
un concert, ont passé deux nuits dans des conditions d'hébergement
très en dessous de ce qu'on attendait. Il est incroyable que cet
hôtel soit classé catégorie 4 étoiles. J'estime que j'ai été
victime de tromperie sur la qualité de l'offre et que ceci relève de
la responsabilité de Booking. Mes enfants et moi voyageons régulièrement
et avons réservé des nuitées d'hôtel avec Booking dans toutes les
régions de France, dans toute l'Europe (Angleterre, Irlande,
Belgique, Espagne, Italie, Hongrie, Danemark, Croatie, etc.) et un peu
partout dans le reste du monde (U.S.A., Maroc, Egypte, Ouzbékistan, ...)
et jamais on a été aussi déçu par un hôtel 4 étoiles.

De kamer was netjes en schoon. Wat verouderd, maar wel schoon. Het bed was voldoende zacht, extra kussens en dekens waren in de kast aanwezig. Het bed en de kamer waren iedere dag schoon gemaakt/opnieuw opgemaakt.
Enkele minuten lopen vanaf Canary Wharf undergroundstation, met een half uur sta je in hartje Londen.

Name: Catarina
Positive: Na casa de banho do quarto, caixote do lixo partido e não abria, a hidromassagem não funcionava, a caixa do sabão não tinha o sabão dentro, dos três cremes que lá tinha um estava aberto e a meio. Serviços de quarto, pedimos uma garrafa de água e um sumo e avisaram-nos que iam demorar de 15 a 20 minutos para entregar no quarto, passaram 40 minutos e ainda não tinham vindo, fomos lá baixo e mandaram nos pedir no bar sem nem um pedido de desculpas. Piscina, aparece nas fotos do hotel e tem que se pagar para usufruir sem referirem isso no site. 9 da manhã somos acordados com uma senhora das limpezas a abrir a porta. O parque para o carro è um balúrdio. Foi uma experiência para não repetir, e 100 libras que não voltarei a dar para serviços assim!

Positive: Albergo molto confortevole sotto ogni punto di vista! Appena arrivato mi hanno dato una camera doppia nonostante io abbia pagato per una singola, senza alcun sovrapprezzo. La stanza molto grande, con una zona “salotto” per rilassarsi dopo una giornata in giro per la città, possibilità di servizio in camera qualora lo si richiedesse e cambio degli asciugamani giornalieri.

Name: Anonymous
Positive:
On a eu vraiment peur au vu des commentaires précédents mais ils ne sont pour certains pas justifiés. La déco est vieillotte certes mais c'est ce qui fait tout le charme de cet hôtel justement. Typique anglais.
Nous avions pris la chambre double standard qui est vraiment très grande avec beaucoup de rangements. 
Très jolie vue avec une grande baie vitrée sur toute la longueur de la chambre.
Tous les équipements étaient là : sèche cheveux,fer a repasser, bouilloire,télé 
La salle de bain était propre et nous n'avons eu aucun soucis de plomberie.
L'emplacement est top a 7 minutes précisément a pied du metro Canary Warf.
Au milieu des building qui surplombent la Tamise c'était magnifique.

Name: Anonymous
Positive: Es war im 1. Zimmer von draußen etwas laut. Durften aber sofort das Zimmer problemlos wechseln.

Name: Anonymous
Positive: Personal beim Einchecken unflexibel, fast unfreundlich: ich solle mein Anliegen (nämlich als Rechnungsadressaten den Firmennamen statt des persönlichen Namens zu verwenden) an booking.com richten, da sie hierauf keinen Einfluss nehmen können. Was Unsinn ist und dann beim Auschecken (von einer anderen Kollegin) korrigiert wurde.

Name: Anonymous
Positive:
- nur 2x 20 Minuten Wlan pro Tag, welches man nur um dieselbe Zeit wie am Vortag reaktivieren konnte. In der heutigen Zeit etwas schwach für ein Londoner Hotel. Manchmal funktionierte das Wlan nicht, da ich scheinbar mein Wlan für diesen Tag „aufgebraucht“ habe, obwohl ich den ganzen Tag nicht im Hotel war. Das Personal blieb sehr hartnäckig und wollte mir nicht entgegenkommen. Sie beschuldigten mich nur und sagten sie können mir nicht helfen. Wenn man mehr als 40 Min Wlan braucht, muss man 7 GBP für 24h wlan zahlen. 
- Bett war ziemlich unbequem, Kissen sehr flach. Habe an der Reception nach einem anderen Kissen gefragt. Sie hatten kein anderes und gaben mir dasselbe (nach 40 Minuten).
- Keine Klimaanlage, nur ein Kleiner Ventilator. Für den Sommer ist dieses Hotel nicht geeignet. Im Winter hat man eine Heizung. Doch durch den grossen Spalt unter der Türe kam die Kälte rein. Habe jede Nacht den Spalt mit einem Handtuch gestopft, da es sonst zu kalt wurde.
- Wir hatten ein sehr einfaches Zimmer ohne Fenster (wie gebucht). Doch das Zimmer war nicht sauber und es roch immer komisch, da der Teppich nicht sauber war. Wir hatten ein Badezimmer für Behinderte, obwohl wir kein solches benötigten. Das Waschbecken war sehr klein und sehr tief unten. Man konnte sich selbst die Hände nicht richtig waschen. 
- Die Lage ist gut an sich. Ca. 10 Minuten vom Bahnhof zu Fuss entfernt. Durch die Baustelle war das Hotel allerdings etwas schwer zugänglich, vor allem am Anfang wenn man sich in der Gegend nicht auskennt. Von Canary Wharf hat man aber gute Verbindungen ins Zentrum.

Name: Anonymous
Positive: Die Lage war super, ein paar Minuten zu Fuss und man war bei der U-Bahn. Mit der Underground ist man auch schnell im Zentrum von London. Das Hotel und die Umgebung ist ruhig und wenn man Abends noch einen Schlummerdrink möchte, hat es gleich nebenan eine super Bar.

Review_title: Sin mantenimiento y para reformar con urgencia
Positive:
Está anticuado, pero eso no es lo peor, lo peor es que no tiene mantenimiento alguno.
Baños cutres, y qué decir del mobiliario. Armario ínfimo y sin capacidad.Moqueta sucia y con lamparones.

Poco personal en recepción(colas kilométricas y atendiendo una persona sólo).

Name: Anonymous
Review_title: NO RECOMENDABLE PARA AMIGOS O FAMILIAS QUE TENGAN QUE DORMIR EN CAMAS SEPARADAS
Positive:
La descripción del hotel respecto de las camas dobles es MENTIRA. NO SON DE 90CM, SON DE 80CM. Si eres una persona grande no te puedes girar en la cama mientras duermes.
Las almohadas son tan planas como el papel de fumar y duermes con la cabeza en muy mala posición.
No dejan gel de baño y champú todos los días.
Solo tiene camas dobles separadas hasta la planta 3 a pesar de que el hotel tiene 12 plantas. 
EVITEN LA HABITACIÓN 305. Está enfrente de la salida del aire acondicionado del hotel y el ruido no te dejará dormir. Es la peor habitación del hotel. Pidan otra mas alejada. Yo pedí el cambio a la 313 para alejarme del extractor. Repito, eviten la 305.
